I’m supporting legislation to provide our servicemembers and their dependents with access to the reproductive health care services they’re entitled to.
Nearly half of all military health system beneficiaries in our country are women. It’s unacceptable that coverage for contraceptives lags behind the benefits that civilians receive under the ACA.

No individual should ever have to face discrimination because of who they love or how they self-identify. I helped introduce the #EqualityAct so that everyone in our nation is treated equally. http://ow.ly/8NSp30owznt

While I am glad that some version of the report finally has been released to the public, all Members of Congress must be able to read and review the full, unredacted report, and I expect that Attorney General Barr will make it available to us soon.

Special Counsel Mueller’s report reminds us exactly why we needed a special counsel investigation in the first place: the Russian government interfered in our elections. The details of Russia’s nefarious acts are clearly set forth in the report.
